Class TextBody

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Get entire paragraph
        Returns:
        entire paragraph

      • length

        public int length()
        Get the length of paragraph
        Returns:
        length of paragraph

      • insertText

        public void insertText(int start,
                       java.lang.String changeStr)
        Insert text to specified position in TextBody
        Parameters:
        start - the index where the text was inserted. If the location is at the head of paragraph, offset will should be 0. If the location is at the tail of paragraph, offset should be the length of paragraph
        changeStr - the specified string which is instered to paragraph

      • removeText

        public void removeText(int start,
                       int length)
        Remove text from TextBody
        Parameters:
        start - the index where the text was removed. If the first character of text is removed at the head of paragraph, offset should be 0
        length - the length of string which is removed from TextBody

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Same as getText()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        entire paragraph
